name: GameBoy Advance Deluxe Collection Vol.1
description:
more collections will be made soon...

GAMES IN THIS VOLUME

that's all of them 

and how to play them?

open mGBA

go to file

and go to load rom

and find the roms folder inside here

and choose any game

and click on the gba file 

DONE

have fun!
